item.title: Fifty ways to leave your model
item.description: The problem is all inside your head, she said to me. The answer is easy if you take it logically. Iâ€™d like to help you in your struggle to be free. There must be fifty2.2162 ways to leave your lovermodel. Suppose we have a theory about the mechanism that sustains insomnia. The theory can be roughly summarized in a (dynamic) causal graph model like so: Figure 1: Example causal model.
